title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the project requirements, including the features and functionalities of the personal health assistant, data sources, and target users.

title: Diseñar la arquitectura del sistema
description: Diseñar la arquitectura general del sistema, incluyendo los componentes, el flujo de datos y los puntos de integración. Considerar aspectos como escalabilidad, mantenibilidad, modularidad, manejo de errores y optimización de rendimiento.
dependencies: Definir el alcance y los requisitos del proyecto

title: Design User Interface
description: Design the user interface for the personal health assistant, including the layout, navigation, user experience, and accessibility considerations.

title: Design Data Storage and Management
description: Design the data storage and management system, including the database schema, data ingestion pipelines, data processing pipelines, data security and privacy measures, and data backup and recovery strategies.

title: Design Health Recommendation Engine
description: Design the health recommendation engine, including the algorithms, data sources, personalization mechanisms, and integration with other system components.

title: Design Security and Privacy Measures
description: Design the security and privacy measures for handling sensitive health data and ensuring user privacy.

title: Define Testing Strategy
description: Define the testing strategy, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests, to ensure the quality and reliability of the system.

title: Plan Deployment and DevOps
description: Plan the deployment and DevOps strategy, including the infrastructure, continuous integration and delivery, and monitoring and logging.

title: Develop Documentation and User Guides
description: Develop comprehensive documentation and user guides for the personal health assistant, including installation, configuration, and usage instructions.
